summary: This is a memorandum documenting a voluntary interview conducted by the DOJ Office of the Inspector General (OIG) with a BOP Lieutenant from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York regarding the death of inmate Jeffrey Epstein. The interview occurred on August 4, 2021, and the report includes numerous attachments of prison logs, emails, and records from August 9-10, 2019.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The inmate whose death is the subject of the OIG investigation. He was found unresponsive in his cell at MCC New York on August 10, 2019.

persons.name: Lieutenant
persons.role: Operations Lieutenant, BOP MCC New York
persons.context: The BOP lieutenant who was interviewed by OIG agents regarding the events surrounding Jeffrey Epstein's death. He was the Operations Lieutenant on August 9, 2019.

persons.name: Senior Special Agent
persons.context: Conducted the voluntary interview of the BOP Lieutenant on August 4, 2021, as part of the OIG investigation.

persons.name: Special Agent
persons.context: Conducted the voluntary interview of the BOP Lieutenant on August 4, 2021, alongside the Senior Special Agent.

connections.description: The OIG Senior Special Agent interviewed the BOP Lieutenant as part of the investigation into Epstein's death.
The OIG Special Agent participated in interviewing the BOP Lieutenant regarding Epstein's death.
The BOP Lieutenant was an Operations Lieutenant at MCC New York where Epstein was housed, responsible for oversight on August 9, 2019.

events.title: OIG Interview of BOP Lieutenant
events.description: Senior Special Agent and Special Agent from the DOJ OIG conducted a voluntary interview of a BOP Lieutenant regarding the death of Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Jeffrey Epstein Found Unresponsive
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was found unresponsive in his cell at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York.

events.title: Lieutenant's Last Shift Before Epstein's Death
events.description: The interviewed BOP Lieutenant served as Operations Lieutenant at MCC New York, the day before Epstein was found dead.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, New York
BOP Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York
keyFacts: The DOJ Office of the Inspector General (OIG) conducted an interview with a BOP Lieutenant on August 4, 2021, as part of its investigation into the death of Jeffrey Epstein.
Jeffrey Epstein (Register Number 76318-054) was found unresponsive in his cell at MCC New York on August 10, 2019.
The interviewed BOP Lieutenant was the Operations Lieutenant at MCC New York on August 9, 2019, the day before Epstein's death.
The memorandum includes 29 attachments of prison records, including daily assignment rosters, logs, count documentation, round check sheets, emails, and a video screenshot from August 9-10, 2019.
The document states it contains neither recommendations nor conclusions, indicating it is a factual record of the interview and collected evidence.
